summary:
Adds eyes, spells and powers from the Naruto Anime to Skyrim.
Balanced and tailored to fit seamlessly right into Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/15699-0-1444478103.png[/img][/center]

[color=yellow]Requirement[/color]
Skyrim 1.8 or higher

[color=yellow]Description[/color]
This Naruto Overhaul adds 105 new standalone eyes for every race and 32 spells from the Naruto Anime along with an assortment of weapons and armour, and a few extra bits like miscellaneous items from the series.

[color=yellow]Installation[/color]
Use the NMM or extract the compressed file and drop the contents in your Data folder.

To change your eyes if you have Dawnguard go to the Face Sculptor in the Ragged Flagon otherwise you can use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20394/]this mod[/url].
As of 1.8 the Sharingan, Byakugan, Sage Mode and Kyuubi Mode powers will change your eyes while active, no need to permanently change them in the Character Creation Menu, they'll change back when the powers wear off.

[color=yellow]Naruto Jutsu[/color]
[color=crimson]Here's a preview of the spells and powers contained in this mod:[/color]

Amaterasu - Shout that burns any target you aim at, will kill most things.
1st word is a single burst, 2nd word is more powerful, 3rd word is an AoE burst that kills anything around you. Better if aimed in first person.
Tsukuyomi - Paralyses any NPC.
Byakugan - Detect all creatures nearby, slowly drains magicka over time,  can be deactivated at will.
Sharingan - Slows time, can be activated and deactivated at will, drains magicka over time.
Shinra Tensei - Knock back, now an alteration spell.
Shinra Tensei area - Knock back area, now an alteration spell.
Chidori Nagashi - AoE lightning spell. 
Chidori Eisou - Lightning beam/spear.
Chidori - Short ranged attack. Benefits from novice destruction, dual cast & shock damage perks.
Rasengan - Short ranged attack. Pushes enemies away when struck.
Kirin - 1 Hit KO most NPCs, benefits from expert destruction & dual cast perks. Must be cast at close range.
8 Gates - Sacrifice your health in exchange for great boosts to physical skills.
Sage mode - Increases regeneration of all three main stats, last 5 minutes, leaves the user fatigued once it runs out and can be deadly if overused.
Kyuubi Mode - Greatly increases all main stats but drains health unless deactivated. Can be fatal if not used carefully.
Dragon Flame Jutsu - Constant gout of fire, each successive rank does more damage but costs more magicka.
Fire Ball Jutsu - Single large fire ball, each rank does more damage but costs more to cast.
Phoenix Flower Jutsu - Fires a large amount of small fireballs, costly but great for crowds.
Teleportation Jutsu - Teleports you a short distance away. Better if aimed in first person.
Kirin - Now has a lightning strike which can be avoided if under cover.
Bansho Ten'in(Universal Pull) - Pull NPCs and throw them around like rag dolls.
Medical Ninjutsu - Ranked Healing, higher ranks cost more but heal more too.
RasenShuriken - Powerful ranged Rasengan, can destroy most enemies without much effort, very costly though.
Hidden Mist Jutsu - Makes you impossible to detect while you destroy your enemies from within the fog.

[color=#ff0000] Along with these you get weapons from the Naruto series like Sasuke's Kusanagi and a few craftable armour pieces including Tobi's Mask as well as ninja Food Pills, headbands, and several others.[/color]

[color=#ffff00]How to get these and more? Just look in the screenshots.
Find the hideout near Riverwood and buy the spells or craft the weapons.[/color]

[color=#ff7700]Recommended Mods:[/color]
You turned into a vampire, and lost your super cool Sharingan and Rinnegan this is for you:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22774/?]Dawnguard Vampires - Retain your Appearance
[/url]Otherwise you can use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24222]Vampiric Thirst by MissLeeches[/url], it has an MCM option to remain looking human.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9717/?]Better Vampires by Brehanin[/url] has a spell that allows you to remain looking human after turning, this could be another alternative.

Want to become part of the almighty Uchiha Clan, want to unlock the secrets of the Sharingan?
Loved the Sharingan in this mod but need more?
This mod is for you:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51136/?]The Uchiha Clan[/url]
This mod is fully compatible with the Uchiha Clan, in fact, the Uchiha Clan is based on this mod and vice versa.
author: Gyn and OmegaRiddick1084

files.name: Ultimate Naruto Overhaul
files.changelogHtml:
- Final Version[for now] of the mod is uploaded.
- Several small bug fixes implemented and some big ones.
- Most noticeable big change is the hole in Bleak Falls Barrow being sealed up.
- Spell descriptions changed to make more sense, some spells rebalanced as well.
- New system for Kyuubi Mode, Sage Mode, Sharingan, and Byakugan implemented. They now change your eyes when active, no more need for making them permanent with the RaceMenu.

files.name: Ultimate Naruto Overhaul 1.9
files.changelogHtml:
- Some animations, which were broken due to changes in 1.8,are now fixed.
- Sage Mode and Kyuubi Mode now get a small speed boost like before.
- Tiny things edited here and there.
- Naruto eyes now in nice convenient BSA.

files.name: Ultimate Naruto Overhaul 2.0
files.changelogHtml:
Kyuubi Mode now raises Stamina, Health and Magicka by a lot but drains it slowly. While it's active it makes destruction spells cost a lot less to to cast, raises magical and melee defence and makes you move faster. Upon deactivation it'll subtract the amount it added to your stats, be careful using this as it may kill you.

Sage Mode remains largely the same as far as stats go but now it has a Fatigue System which lowers your stats as soon as it wears off, if Sage Mode is used again each consecutive time it'll lower you stats further, it CAN kill you. Sage Mode must also be charged for 10 seconds to be used, you'll know when it's ready when you hear the Jutsu sound. I also cleaned up the active effects so it's not messy.

Lightning Armor and 8 Gates were changed slightly. Lightning Armor now raises your unarmed damage and speed a little more but costs a bit of magicka per second to maintain. It will remain active even if you have 0 Magicka so if you want to cast something you have to turn it off. 8 Gates is pretty much the same but I cleaned up the active effects here too.

Changed a lot of spell names to Japanese since the majority were already in Japanese to begin with. Rebalanced a few things, made a lot of spells a little stronger for people having trouble using them at higher difficulties.

The rest is minor bug fixes like a lot of spells that were simple buffs and were set to "Loud" for some reason. Now you can cast Hidden Mist Jutsu without everyone finding you instantly.

files.name: Skyrim Naruto Overhaul 2.0b
files.changelogHtml:
Made Sage Mode weaker. It was incredibly OP before.
Hopefully fixed Phoenix Flower Jutsu, needs testing.

files.name: Naruto Overhaul 2.0c
files.changelogHtml:
Tsukuyomi explosion no longer triggers traps or enemies.
8 Gates should dispel correctly now.
Perks removed as they were completely useless and unnecessary; I didn't find any spells that even benefited from them.

files.name: Naruto Overhaul 2.0d
files.changelogHtml:
Phoenix Flower Jutsu hopefully fixed... again... it now has an On Hit sound, same sound as firebolts.
Sharingan and Byakugan will no longer drain health once Magicka runs out, they'll just keep draining magicka. Just like with Lightning Armour turn them off to get your Magicka back.
Spells broken by deleting the perks should now work correctly, I'm really sorry. I made a booboo.
Minor fixes to other things and some descriptions changed as well.
Naruto - Overhaul.esp thoroughly cleaned, same with Jutsu.esp

files.name: Skyrim Naruto Anime Overhaul 2.1
files.changelogHtml:
Many spells rebalanced and reworked completely because it was quite messy before.
Descriptions cleaned up on a few things.
Amaterasu healing bug fixed.
Headbands and Edo Tensei robe added*
Corrected the double description on the Chakra Enhanced Strength.
*-Edo Tensei robe not craftable or available for Female characters yet, also looks weird on males. Only there for preview.

files.name: Naruto Ultimate Overhaul 2.2
files.changelogHtml:
Edo Tensei officially added and craftable.
Headbands updated, now with normal distinction available.
Akatsuki Rings added.
Sage Mode rebalanced very slightly.
Other minor things changed.
Check Uchiha Clan Changelog for more details.

files.name: Naruto Ultimate Overhaul
files.changelogHtml: Phoenix Flower CTD Hotfix - I need your help testing this because it's such a specific bug that's been annoying us for the longest time.

files.name: Naruto Ultimate Overhaul 2.2c
files.changelogHtml:
Indra's Mangekyou Sharingan Added.
Tenseigan Added, courtesy of gyn.

files.name: Naruto Ultimate Overhaul 2.3
files.changelogHtml:
SPELL TOMES:
- A spell that places a single explosive tag is now for sale (Destruction). Base of the spell is the Fire Rune spell. Changes from the base spell (besides visuals): (1) this spell is silent (enemies will not hear you place it); (2) range to place the tag is significantly shorter than the fire rune.
- A spell tome that places multiple explosive tags was also added. It takes longer to place (and has an higher cost) but does more damage.
- "Spell Tome: Insect Spray" was added to the Destruction vendor.
- Added two new spell tomes to the Destruction Vendor. One allows you to create Truth Seeking Balls, while the other allows you to launch them against a target.

WEAPONS:
- Added to the blacksmith the "Sage of Six Paths' Staff".

ARMORS:
- Added the "Truth Seeking Balls" to the blacksmith. Besides allowing you to enchant them, they also add a spell that allows you to launch 8 Truth Seeking Balls against an opponent (no need to create a Truth Seeking Ball).

Note: you can be killed by your own Truth Seeking Balls. Watch your step.

files.name: Naruto Ultimate Overhaul 2.3b
files.changelogHtml:
WEAPONS:
- Added the Shibuki with the capacity to place explosive tags with power attacks (all credit goes to Cha0sr1pper and Urwy. Original mod here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12213/?). This weapon can be crafted and purchased.

MAGIC:
- Truth Seeking Balls kills will count towards the amount of people killed. However, characters caught in the crossfire won't count (to avoid multiple kills being counted when they all refer to the same one).

files.name: Naruto Ultimate Overhaul 2.3c
files.changelogHtml:
MAGIC:
- "Insect Spray": Made it more blackish and removed several other visual effects on it, to be as "clean" as possible in terms of visuals.

files.name: Naruto Ultimate Overhaul v2.4
files.changelogHtml:
ARMOR:
- Tobi's dark robes are now officially in the mod. It was optimised for 0 weight, both in female and male, but there should be no issues for heavier characters.

MAGIC:
- Changed the 7-Gates to a blue aura.
- Changed the 8-Gates to a red aura.
- Added an Alternative Kyuubi Mode (changes color scheme and so in order to be a more Tenseigan look).

files.name: Naruto Ultimate Overhaul v2.4b
files.changelogHtml:
Sharingan:
-Hopefully fixed the damn bug where people get angry at you for using it!
MAGIC:
-Kirin fixed, hopefully. Once it starts raining it should only take a second before the target is struck. Moving targets are hard to hit sometimes, not much I can do about that.

files.name: Naruto Ultimate Overhaul 2.4c
files.changelogHtml:
Sharingan and Byakugan:
-Draugr and other enemies should no longer wake up when you use it around them, credits to alchrisgalura.
-Remove "Slow Time" explosion effect because I didn't like how it looked.
ITEMS:
-The Food Pills can now be cooked[crafted at a cooking station].

files.name: Naruto Ultimate Overhaul 2.5
files.changelogHtml:
MAGIC:
-Kyuubi Mode (Alternative) renamed to Tenseigan Chakra Mode.
-Sharingan and Byakugan actually fixed now because I'm dumb. (sorry)
-Along with them most buffs, upon being dispelled, will also no longer piss people off.

Note: If I missed any please tell me and I'll fix it as well. Buffs aren't supposed to cause hostility.
